text: læa cak xuth sxng taw læa cak waw sxng taw cng klaw theid (muhammad) wa tawphu sxng taw nan kranan hrux thi phraxngkh thrng ham hrux wa tawmeiy thang sxng nan hrux thi mdluk khxng tawmeiy thang sxng nan di khumkhrxng raksʹa wi hrux wa phwk than rwm xyu khna thi xallxhˌ di thrng rabsang kæ phwk than dwy sing ni k khır lea khux phu thi xthrrm ying kwa phu thi di xuplokn khwam thec hı kæ xallxhˌ pheux ca thahı mnusʹy hlng phid doy mimi khwam ru thæ cring xallxhˌ nan ca mi thrng næana klum chn thi xthrrm
